ch0076_09_collector/2701_0701_01_10:
The Pasio Pokémon Center is THE place for
sync pairs from all around to gather.
ch0076_09_collector/2701_0701_02_10:
But now we’ve made it a gathering place for us,
Team Break!
ch0076_09_collector/2701_0701_03_10:
In other words, all the sync pairs here now belong
to our organization!
ch0076_09_collector/2701_0701_04_10:
Well, that’s how I liked to see it, anyway.
Tricia got mad at me when I started talking
about it, so I decided to stop.
ch0076_09_collector/2701_0701_05_10:
Why, you ask? Because I’d rather have someone
I’m interested in smile at me than yell at me,
of course!
